thread.title: BARRETT, PATRICK

author: BARRETT, PATRICK
title: BARRETT, PATRICK
text: Your videos are great but I was depressed about wasting a bottle of durgol because no one thought to include an update to the instruction manual. I don't know how it should have been done but I shouldn't need ti call help line when the Descale light wouldn't go out. They say you have to waste product to find out if you have a newer machine. I don't think so cause I found it online where if you printed name on the front of machine says Brerra Gaggia, then you have the new machine. they whoever should have included new instructions inside. Other than that, just the new instructions , step 1 should read add water to container and add descaling solution. they forgot that in the new Descaling instructions.
